content.p: We are providing you with a new platform called the UNM Alumni Network where you can connect and engage with your fellow alumni friends from all over the world. You will also receive updates from us regarding alumni benefits, exclusive events and career opportunities. It's quick and easy to do! If you have previously set up an alumni account on the UNM Alumni Network, you can also sign in here to view and edit your information. Any questions? Contact us for help at alumnirelations@nottingham.edu.my All information is held securely on the Universityâ€™s central database and will be treated confidentially and with respect in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act 1998. Unless you tell us otherwise, the data may be used for events programmes, alumni activities involving academic and administrative departments, fundraising programmes and for the promotion of benefits and services, which may involve an element of direct marketing. The data will not be disclosed to any external organisations, other than those acting as agents of the university. If you do not wish you information to be used in this way, please write to the Alumni and Donor Relations Office at AlumniRelations@nottingham.edu.my telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8373 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8657 email: alumnirelations@nottingham.edu.my
